sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react";
import { Button, Modal, Form } from "react-bootstrap";
import firebase from "../services/firebase";

function ProductForm(props) {
  const [show, setShow] = useState(false);

  const handleClose = () => setShow(false);
  const handleShow = () => setShow(true);

  return (
    <>
      <Button variant="primary" onClick={handleShow}>
        新增商品
      </Button>

      <Modal
        show={show}
        onHide={handleClose}
        backdrop="static"
        keyboard={false}
      >
        <Modal.Header closeButton>
          <Modal.Title>新增商品</Modal.Title>
        </Modal.Header>
        <Modal.Body>
          <Form>
            <Form.Group>
              <Form.File id="exampleFormControlFile1" label="選取圖片" />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlInput1">
              <Form.Label>產品名稱</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlSelect1">
              <Form.Label>產品類別</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control as="select">
                <option>生乳捲</option>
                <option>生乳塔</option>
                <option>常溫蛋糕</option>
                <option>節慶禮盒</option>
                <option>其他商品</option>
              </Form.Control>
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlInput1">
              <Form.Label>原價</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="number" />
            </Form.Group>
            <Form.Group controlId="exampleForm.ControlInput1">
              <Form.Label>特價</Form.Label>
              <Form.Control type="number" placeholder="無特價請空白" />
            </Form.Group>
          </Form>
        </Modal.Body>
        <Modal.Footer>
          <Button variant="secondary" onClick={handleClose}>
            關閉
          </Button>
          <Button variant="primary">新增</Button>
        </Modal.Footer>
      </Modal>
    </>
  );
}

export default ProductForm;
